doc:
Sam Flint https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Flint 0 Sam Flint (October 19, 1882 – October 17, 1980) was an American actor. Flint was married to actress Ella Ethridge, whom he met after she watched him in a play in Galveston, Texas. Later they had an agreement: "Neither will accept a part with any company unless the contract includes the other." Sam_Flint ( October_19_,_1882 – October_17_,_1980 ) was an_American_actor . Flint was_married to actress_Ella_Ethridge , whom he met after she watched him in a_play in Galveston , Texas . Later they had an_agreement : " Neither will_accept a_part with any_company unless the_contract includes the_other .
